resources.string: The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth; for science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words.
Today is a great day for Machine Translation!
This is some more text. Please translate it.
Today is such a great day!
The best place to discover wonderful furniture to make your home beautiful

"This stand is made of natural wood. The design is very simple and minimal. This is truly one of the best pieces for any home. Available in 3 different colors, you can easily select the best match for your home. "
